item.title: way-clipping produces bad tiles
item.description:
From cak...@gmail.com on October 24, 2014 11:45:57
What steps will reproduce the problem? 1.Extract bbox 42.72/2.81 42.30/3.40 from europe.osm.pbf (geofabrik) 2.Convert to .map file with standards options What is the expected output? What do you see instead? The map is partially incomplete and the background is visible for zoom 8/11 What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Writer 0.4.0 or 0.5.0-rc2 Linux ubuntu 14-04 Please provide any additional information below. With the same PBF file and with way-clipping=false the map is correct for all zoom levels
Attachment: ko.png ok.png
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=536
